criterion: Provides information on how to reduce cholesterol through diet
Falsely states that eggs are a primary source of cholesterol
Asks for more context about the user's query to provide a more accurate response
Uses natural language and is easy to understand for the user
Provides instructions on how to replace saturated fats with healthier alternatives
Mentions that omega-3 fatty acids can reduce triglycerides and increase HDL cholesterol
Does not recommend relying solely on supplements for heart health
Does not provide information on how to improve blood cholesterol through exercise
Fails to mention that avocados are a good source of monounsaturated fatty acids
